articles.author: Jakob Hanke Vela
articles.title: EU seeks emergency powers on supply chains - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Internal Market Commissioner Thierry Breton says Brussels will propose new law in the spring.
articles.content: The European Commission is planning to unveil a proposal early next year for new powers that would allow Brussels to secure supplies during a crisis, according to an internal message seen by POLITICO… [+2129 chars]
